title.value: Bug Characterization in Machine Learning-based Systems
title.justification: "Bug Characterization in Machine Learning-based Systems" is the title of the paper as stated at the beginning.
title.quote: Bug Characterization in Machine Learning-based Systems

extractions.description: The paper investigates the characteristics of bugs in ML-based software systems, comparing ML and non-ML bugs from the software maintenance viewpoint. The study involves a manual inspection of issues from GitHub repositories that use TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Keras, aiming to identify patterns and suggest areas for improvement in maintenance practices and tool support.

type.justification: The study is based on empirical data collected from GitHub repositories and involves manual inspection and analysis of issues.
type.quote: In this paper, we investigate the characteristics of bugs in ML-based software systems and the difference between ML and non-ML bugs from the maintenance viewpoint.

name.justification: The study focuses on ML-based systems, which falls under the broader research field of Deep Learning.
name.quote: Machine Learning (ML) is a branch of Artificial Intelligence (AI) that has been applied in a large number of practical applications...

name.justification: The study specifically aims to understand the characteristics of bugs in ML-based systems from the software maintenance perspective.
name.quote: ...it is necessary to investigate the usage of ML components, from the software maintenance perspective.

name.justification: Neural Networks are mentioned as the type of models implemented in ML-based systems.
name.quote: In this paper, we investigate the characteristics of bugs in ML-based software systems... one needs to implement an ML model, such as a neural network

name.justification: The dataset comprises issues collected from GitHub repositories for the analysis conducted in the study.
name.quote: We extracted 447,948 GitHub repositories... and raise 386 sampled reported issues in the identified ML-based systems

name.justification: TensorFlow is one of the three popular ML frameworks exclusively mentioned as part of the study.
name.quote: ...used one of the three most popular ML frameworks, i.e., TensorFlow, Keras, and PyTorch

name.justification: Keras is one of the three popular ML frameworks exclusively mentioned as part of the study.
name.quote: ...used one of the three most popular ML frameworks, i.e., TensorFlow, Keras, and PyTorch

name.justification: PyTorch is one of the three popular ML frameworks exclusively mentioned as part of the study.
name.quote: ...used one of the three most popular ML frameworks, i.e., TensorFlow, Keras, and PyTorch
